>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/message/send-text"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permite enviar un mensaje de texto a un número de WhatsApp.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Datos necesarios para enviar el mensaje.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"123456789","description":"Número de teléfono en formato internacional sin el \"+\"."},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Plain text message","description":"Mensaje de texto a enviar."}},"title":"EnviarMensajeRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Mensaje enviado correctamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"object","properties":{"remoteJid":{"type":"string","example":"51123456789@s.whatsapp.net"},"fromMe":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"id":{"type":"string","example":"BAE51C2115EE6FC0"}}},"message":{"type":"object","properties":{"extendedTextMessage":{"type":"object","properties":{"text":{"type":"string","example":"Plain text message"},"contextInfo":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}}}}}},"messageTimestamp":{"type":"string","example":"1726586899"},"status":{"type":"string","example":"PENDING"}}}},"title":"SuccessResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Error en la solicitud","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"No autorizado (Token incorrecto o ausente)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"Error interno del servidor","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
